law.catch_line: Assessment or cooperative life or casualty company may change to stock or mutual plan.
law.text: Any domestic company may, upon complying with the provisions of KRS 299.230 to 299.300, become a life insurance company upon the mutual or stock plan, subject to the laws of this state applicable to such companies, and those prescribing how articles of incorporation shall be amended.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 681b-1.
